TopicTitle: Orbits of unfocused vessels move along with current vessel

Articles.Content:
KSP Version: 0.1.1.0 21572
OS: Windows 10  22H2
CPU: AMD Ryzen 7 5800X3D
GPU: Nvidia GeForce RTX 2070 Super

Expected behavior: Vessel trajectories remain unchanged whether focused or unfocused, unless a burn is being performed.

Observed behavior: Unfocused in-range vessels' orbits were dragged along with the current vehicle whenever I time warped. This happened at least three times:

  1. I left a piece of debris on an escape trajectory from the Mun, but its orbit was captured and pulled into a collision course during time warp
  2. From a ~50km x 50km circular orbit, the CM was pulled into a collision course with the surface when the LM went to land
  3. After the CM burned to exit Mun's SOI, the LM was pulled from a circular orbit into an escape trajectory from the Mun.
